case.state: Is this actually some multi-school event? What a coincidence!
Wait a minute, those are school uniforms! I had no idea this was a national school competition.
I came here to overcome stage fright. Doing it with four guys stripping might pose a challenge.
I was hoping for a higher quantity of girls who like magic.
Are there no guys here? Hmph! They must hate magic!
Today's show will star the squad of us magic loving gals!
Hey! Who is ready to see some spectacular magic?
I've come fully prepared just for everyone playing!
We're going to have a magical stripping time!
No one is going to be bored tonight with me around!
Ladies and gentlemen, get ready for my exciting magic show!
We could do this in my room next time. My tricks would go completely camo there.
This room is boring. I'd rather have this in my room. I have bird cages and wands and other cool accessories for me to show off.
Seriously, just you two? I'm not going to stop my show anyways.
I was expecting a bigger audience at a place with strip poker and a cute magician.
Based on one psychological study, a smaller audience will decrease the likelihood of people booing when I fail. So, we will have so much fun together!
Wait, there's a nice open seat for one more person. Or maybe you're so desperate to see my magic show start.
You're all going to lose. Nobody can outsmart my magic tricks.
This whole game is all one big magic act by me. You see, I am a pro when it comes to cards.
You can refer to me as Sempai, because you are all my temporary assistants for this game.
Pass me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ for this act.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, here, please!
Assista-, err, dealer, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
Dealer, I need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
This trick requires ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I pick ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Pick a card? I choose ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
This is definitely good. I have nothing to worry- OUCH!
Yaaay! I've got a happy hand of cards!
I don't need dummy cards for this game, not that I was using them earlier.
A prodigy of card tricks is also a prodigy of card games.
Avert your eyes to my hand. Watch carefully of what I will do next.
Behold! You will see why I said "behold" any moment!
You think I'm the type to do the "Three-card Monte"? That would require one of you here to know that I'm a cheater, which none can prove.
You can use a plant against me. They will find nothing wrong with my hands and body.
This hand may look suspiciously good, but I assure you that I picked them out with powdered gloves.
I have time to build a house of cards with these. Just give me a few seconds, and don't rush me!
Watch, as I turned a simple hand into a magical stripping hand!
I believe in you, little cardies!
As long as the printed displays are correct, I consider this cardistry.
I know all the secrets of card tricks. Your dealings are no match for my sleights.
Oh I've seen this type of pattern. This is definitely a winning set of cards.
Heh heh! These cards are infallible. They will never hurt me.
Want to know the secret to a good hand of cards? Sorry, but that's confidential magicians.
So lovely! Good cards get all my care!
I did it! You should call me the Queen of Cards!
Ta-dah! The magic has bestowed a winning hand.
Is this my card? Oh yes it is! And this, and this, and this.
Let's see, if the others have- OUCH!
I could palm one of these cards. Four cards in a hand is probably legal.
Th-This was exactly what I wanted. I'm not exaggerating, this hand is all part of my act!
I have an absolutely brilliant hand. There's just a smudge on one of these.
Wouldn't it be funny to gradually replace every card I give with my own deck? I drew my own face cards and symbols, so everyone will always play with me.
If I followed the book properly, I know these cards will not lose no matter what. If not, I will request a refund.
I've beaten everyone in every card game I played. I've only lost during foul plays.
One of you is going to lose this round. I'm sorry for doing whatever to win.
Wait wait wait! I think I picked the wrong cards! I forgot, I have to actually think now.
Hold on, swapping this card creates... Ahahaha.
Here's a secret. Magicians purposely mess up acts on purpose as misdirection to a grandiose surprise. You all haven't seen it yet.
I'm still learning the art of escaping, but escaping a loss should be super duper simple.
What do you think is in my hand? Are these good cards? Even I don't know.
Anyone want me to do a card trick with their hand? This trick requires only one card.
Time to use context clues. Anyone suspiciously darting their eyes side to side?
Give me a moment to focus. I can guess every one of your cards through mind reading.
Based on the cards I counted and the order of everyone's turn to swap, I should win this round.
Damn, I might have to lose this- OUCH!
Can't get any worse than thi- OUCH!
Hmm, no folds, markings, or any crimps. Nobody is trying to counter-trick me.
Hehe. Anyone want to try a card trick with me? It involves switching your highest card with my lowest.
Would you mind letting me pick the cards from the deck next time?
I know I did this trick correctly. It was one of you who was obviously distracting when I'm performing. That's very rude, you know.
Can I try that deal again? My hand accidentally slipped on one of the cards. Clumsy fingers.
If I look at the cards like this, and cover it up with my fingers, I have a nice pair. No, even three in a row.
If I lose, I'll just say this failure was on purpose as misdirection.
Oh no, I think this poor card is slightly torn. Can I have a new card to replace it?
Uh... Bad cards? No, such a concept does not exist for me.
Hehe, what a nice hand of cards. Maybe they want to meet some other ones.
My hand is so good that I don't need to look at them. Therefore, you have no need to see it either.
Hmm hmm hmm. You guys seen any cards somewhere?
I'm not ready to see this trick play out. Nothing bad about my hand, I'm just nervous... nervous that my hand is bad.
There's no way I can lose with this hand. I just need to cover one of them up with some glue and marker.
I have seen this before. The dealer is doing some equivoque against me, forcing the bad cards on me. Very funny.
A-and now. I will p-present to you all m-my winning hand.
If someone trades me a c-card, I'll give you a free personal m-magic act!
Ah! My feet are burning now! Damn carpet burns!
Ugh, actually my feet feel weird. So this is why we wear socks when wearing shoes.
Ow! Instant regret! My feet are stinging in these shoes now.
I didn't shave because I anticipate showing myself for a show. I did it because people like it, which includes me.
Is it sexy for you? I can do some insertion tricks if you want me to. But, you're going to have to beat me first!
It helps to shave if you want to be licked out. Well, I think it helps based on what I infer.
I could've pulled out magic flags or plastic balls like some erotic performer, but I didn't want to walk around all day like that.
I have special stage panties, but I don't know why I didn't wear them. This is like the only time where I could appropriately show them off.
I'm wearing a tight skin colored suit. I'm not naked!
My boobs are big and soft. It makes it easier to hide stuff under my shirt, though they are very sensitive to touch.
I always forget how much they jiggle until they accidentally come out during an act, or just any physical activity with people.
This isn't the first time I've showed off my boobs to someone. B-but I swear, my assistant is the one responsible for those mishaps!
I have a trick where I could lick my own boob, but I think it's only impressive if I were flat chested.
There are plenty of websites with sexual imagery of me. If I really get you off with my antics, have some clean up stuff ready.
It would be sad if you are actually taking off your clothes like your player character.
You and ~player~ don't act like a couple, yet you're both so clingy. What kind of club are you and ~player~ running, Nagatoro?
I've figured it out. ~Player~ and Nagatoro are actually starting a two-man club! What kind of activities have you two been planning?
I'm confused, is this just a game you're playing with ~player~, Nagatoro? Are you trying to see who can crack each other first?
Is this abuse towards ~player~ just a couple's act, Nagatoro? If it's just his kink, then at least I know he is crying tears of lust.
Wait a minute, Sheena. Are those cards you've been playing all conjured by you? How do you actually do that spinning card trick without hidden strings or wind?
I've got a penchant for baked goods, Kumatora. Though, I like to add a "surprise" inside. Nobody seems to like it though.
I love all sorts of sweet stuff, Kumatora. I like candy, and ice cream, and cake! It's impossible to meet someone who hates them!
Of course I have very close friends, Kumatora! I've got my reliable assistant who always comes to my club because of me and my magic!
There is one unexpected close friend I made, Kumatora. One girl in my club named Saki is kind of my rival, and tried to hijack my club. But somehow, we are now on good terms!
That's an easy question, Senko. I feel loved if someone genuinely enjoys my magic. If they don't, I just force them to enjoy my magic. They eventually give in.
I love being pampered from simple touches. They can be ticklish, or they can be squishy. Every touch has its own sense of love.

The video camera is the best amenity for me. I can do magic in my bedroom, and get lots of loving comments all around the world. A lot of them even comment certain timestamps where I look the cutest, isn't that cool?
I was thinking your gloves were using pyrotechnics, Kumatora. I guess I can't replicate them for my magic.
How can I do that PSI magic myself, Kumatora? I want to train my brain to ignite stuff.
Do magic wands come in orange now, Nami? Or did you desecrate it with your own paint?
Nami, you're not going to leave me hanging on that magic weather stick. I want to know how to rain all over my audience!
You only ever read two of the character's lines in every game. Adding more than two people here just increases the challenge. And for what, more nudity?
Do you actually read everything we say? We're going to be stuck here all night if you keep that up.
~Player~, why are you stalking this girl? If she wants to go to those adult businesses, you let her be!
Do you even care about my actual source material, or do you just want to strip the cute magician girl with big tits?
"Kumatora"... I know, we should call you "Kum"! It's so obvious, yet simple!
I just so happen to be prepared to do an underwater escape act. Oh, except for a swimsuit, but doing it naked should be fine for tonight.
Let me know if you want to see an underwater escape trick. Would it pique your interest if I say several people have died trying it in the past?
Did you know I can escape from being tied up underwater? I've almost drowned every time I did it, but I'm still here, and can do it again.
April fools is all about fooling people when they least expect it. Why is everyone here presented as blatant silliness then?
Ah! A double date for these cards. Poor little third wheel card though.
This pair is like me and assistant. This other pair is like Saki and her brother. Hmm, I guess this one is Madara. Don't worry, you'll find someone.
Is that a real real magic wand, ~name~? Do it make sparkles when you swish it in the air?
Aw, we could bring magic wands this whole time? I wish I knew. Now how am I supposed to brag about it without proof?
~Name~, can you let me play with that wand? I'll be careful not to use some evil spells that would burn down the Earth.
Ta-da! My hand has a pair! Oh, I can't show it to anyone yet?
I've got a pair of twinsies!
Voila, the duplicating card trick!
Aww, the deck birthed a little friend!
I'm sorry, but I fail to see the difference between those things. Magic is magic.
It's not pretty fun. It's super fun! It can be proven with a demonstration!
I don't get what you're talking about, Aqua. Sleight of hand is channeling magical power.
Are you actually a magician, Jura? Teach me how I can turn the Earth yellow some time! For now, let me show you my expertise.
Finally, my shoes were killing me!
It was a mental battle between standing in these shoes any longer, or throwing the round. No more decision making!
Nope, I thought I could bear the pain. Now get these things off my feet!
I was getting tired of going on a magic drought, but unfortunately I have to show off now.
Question. What do you think you will find where I tear off my bra? The answer is...
I wasn't walking away with magic but no act.
I let you all have this win. I was itching to show you a cool magic trick.
Oh no, I messed up, I have to strip. It means I get to show magic!
I knew you all wanted to see me perform!
Aww, I was actually enjoying my streak.
Wait, I was supposed to win!
Hey, I want a redo! I was actually enjoying my wins for once!
Finally, it's time for the disappearing panties trick. I just push and shove into...
My turn? Yep, a girl who plays fair will sometimes lose.
Finally, I can show off something again. Oh, um...
Finally, I was practicing over and over again for this quick change trick!
What trick was I doing next? Ah, I remember!
Were you guys getting bored with regular stripping?
I must've misplaced, err, picked out the wrong card. Haha.
Losing? Of course I did. I'm such a bad magician, I have to do some magic now. Poor me!
As if I let you win on purpose. Uh, that doesn't mean I lost on purpose either. Never mind, it's time for magic!
I know I look cute, but that's not the reason I'm excited about this loss. It's to silence your curiosity of my magic acts.
Wait, I needed my cape for the quick change. Whatever, I bet you won't figure out the magic behind this anyways.
I need my shirt for concealing magic acts, so...
I lost, so I'm not cheating, see? What I am hiding though are, uh...
So those cards you saw were just something I forgot to put away. I don't have any more props under my clothes.
Don't be so confident that I lost. I just wanted to get out of my shoes is all.
Woah woah, hold your comments and cheers. My feet are just trying to murder me.
Passing the baton to me? I am hyped!
So long as my magic acts have so far been golden, why should I care that I lost?
It's time to make my panties disappear the most appropriate way. I will shove them inside...
Have you been waiting to see my boobs so much? Well, you'll be sorely disappointed...
I wouldn't hold that grin on your face. What I really have under my bra is...
How did I mess up? Or did you set me up just to see my tricks that badly? Okay, watch my first act.
Wah, already? My magic would never back stab me like this! It won't fail me this time though.
I must've missed a step. I think I forgot to slip in- never mind, I'll just perform my first trick
How did you outsmart me? What did you all do?
This loss was not done from my failure. It must be fate for a prodigy magician.
I have no need to complain. I have plenty of tricks. Erm...
Yes, you wanted more tricks! Not card tricks, no way! I'd never use trick cards here!
What? I thought I was going to- oh well, I could take these off now.
You wanted to see a magic trick so badly? That's wonderful, but I have to postpone it to get these shoes off. I literally can't stand standing in them.
I did prepare for these kinds of tricks, so this is really a positive outcome.
Hey, don't tally this loss. I'll tell you when I legitimately lose!
I didn't lose from my own aptitude. This is all part of my show.
I, uh, just wanted to show you all more magic...
Wait, I really should be winning more. There are stupid cheaters interfering with my magic!
Already? Well I have a places to store my panties anyways. I will shove into...
I lost again? Fine, I'll deliver the reward now. Or is it really a reward?
Hmph! You want to see my boobs? We'll see about that when I...
So, there's this trick I really wanted to show off. Therefore, this is not an official loss, okay?
One, two, three...
Watch very carefully. And...
Much better! I'd rather not get blisters.
Ah, that feels better. I should've taken them off during my last stripping.
Left foot, right foot. Let the piggies come out.
Ta-da! No, wait!
Ta-da! Ah!
I would never take my skirt off in a show, but it happens some- AH!
I'd never do perverted magic acts, but maybe here I could- AH!
For next trick, I will take my skirt off, and use it to- AH!
Watch as I use my skirt to turn it into- AH!
I'm just going to carefully and slowly untie my bow and remove my shirt because I want to take my time, and no one will touch them ever again.
Actually, I'm going to postpone my trick this time. Nope, nothing under here. Just ignore me as I nonchalantly take off my shirt and tie.
I had a cool bowtie trick, but I'm just going to remove my shirt in a not so conspicuous way. I have nothing worth noting under my shirt.
Don't mind me, I'm taking off a stupid tie. You can look away from this act. I'm not like folding away hidden cards or something, hehehe.
Pay full attention to my feet...
I will remove my socks without touching my shoes at all...
Am I taking my shoes off first? Think again!
Be amazed by my feet. Or more precisely...
Tada! Uh-oh, um. Where are the tapes I had under...
Tada! Ah, where's my tapes? Oh...
Yah! Eh? I thought I had tapes under, uh... Tada!
Yah! Hey, where are my ta- uh, I mean, tada! Hahaha.
...my hands, and ta-da! They have vanished!
...my hands! Where did they go? It's magic!
Ta-da! I removed my socks without removing my shoes at all!
Yah! The magic or removing socks while wearing my shoes!
Ta-da! My socks are intact, yet have been pulled right through my feet and shoes!
Ha! The amazing socks through my shoes and leg bones trick!
Fly away! Find a new wardrobe to live!
Bye-bye, cape and hat!
Now I remember the real reason I needed a cape.
That was the surprise, ha ha! I'll just button up before I catch a cold.
Oh, that's where I put my magic ca- I mean cheat sheet notes for class. Haha.
That was totally part of my act. I just wanted to let you in on my magical secrets.
It's not what you think. Those were my own playing card. Oh, I mean, my magic playing cards for my magic act, of course. Hehe.
I wasn't hiding anything. Just some business cards with magical prints on the back.
Whoa, how did these get here? Some little trickster laced these in my skirt!
So what do you all think of my panties? They definitely don't hide any cards or anything. Hehe.
Oh, those cards were just a prank. I wasn't using them at all. I just used this for this funny joke, and you all fell for it.
Hehe, don't we all like to fool our friends before we fool our enemies? See, we're all friends here who can take a joke.
See? I have no cards hidden anywhere!
This bra is not a magical one that hides cards, I swear!
No need to be suspicious of me! Not even a metal detector could find a trace of cards!
Don't worry, I have a real magic trick for next time.
Now that I have ended my internal agony, I'm ready to do some real magic!
Tada! My feet have appeared!
I'm wearing no clothes, so where could my panties have possibly gone?
No panties means no panty thievery!
Yeah, that was the trick. You can see my boobs now...
I was just kidding about having something underneath. It was just a fakeout...
D-don't stare too much. My act is over anyways.
I guess I have nothing covering my boobs... which was all part of the act...
Tada! Look at my amazing cards! Lookie lookie,~name~!
I want to see a cool disappearing act! I'll teach you one just so you can do it.
Tada! My hand made you lose! I deserve a round of applause.
Take off something worth watching. Unless you have stage fright, then take your time.
Show us how stripping can be cooler than magic, because it will never be!
It's ~name~'s turn! Come on, don't be shy. That's the worst way to act in this game.
You just can't handle my magic. But hey, this is all part of my act, otherwise I'd be naked now.
I'm watching very carefully, ~name~. Do something that would really make my mouth gape.
I'm like your cute assistant helping you get undressed in front of others. I should get a teensy praise for this.
I knew what cards you had, ~name~. I knew from the start that you would lose.
I already knew everyone's hand. If I would've lost, I would've said so after my swap.
A good magic trick starts with telling people your amazing end result. Let's try it, ~name~. Just say "I will appear completely naked."
Magic rules, regular card playing drools.
I had full trust in these cards. I'm proud of them!
Want to know how I got such a good hand? Too bad, it's a secret patented by me, and shared only to me!
Only the super awesome people win this round.
Won with nothing up my hidey spots.
You have been bested by not just magic, but by me!
You can learn some card stuff with me, and maybe you would win more often.
Your expression is telling me "I was trying my very best, but Sempai is just too smart for me!"
I knew you would lose, ~name~! Your jittery hand movements exposed everything.
In your face! I can win, with or without magic!
Accept your defeat like it's your job!
H-hey, I didn't call you to help! Oh, y-you're just stripping.
You can o-only strip. No assisting nor s-showing off something cool.
You didn't lose by my magic, so this loss isn't anything special.
I don't have anything else prepared, so go crazy with what you want to do, ~name~.
Don't let this show go out like a birthday candle.
There's no way you can out-do my performance, unless you're willing to make a bet.
I have a proposal. You can give up a banknote to me instead of stripping. I'm bored, and I want to show off a trick that involves spontaneous repair.
With white hair like yours, ~name~, you can be my stripping body double.
If you confidently claim to be a magical girl, this act better make me cry from envy.
Yes, ~name~ is stripping. She's going to destroy her own clothes with fire and weird colors!
Come on, use your powers! Pretend I'm your nemesis!
Activate your stripping powers!
If you're as powerful as you say you are, I want to you put those words into magic.
Hey, just pretend we're all friends who strip together like normal friends.
People who strip make more friends than those who sit around being clothed and all.
I'll give you some hugs if you feel down, but only if you're feeling down. I want squeeze the sad out of you!
I hope you wouldn't mind if I gave you some headpats. I always give them to anything cute, even if they yell at me.
You're cute, but like a different kind of cute from me. You're like "I want to pinch your face" cute.
I knew I wasn't cursed this whole time!
What a relief! For a moment, I thought everything I touched would lead to catastrophe.
I take back everything I said. I love my cards!
I won? With my high card? Unbelievable!
My magic actually saved me this round!
Tada! Look at my amazing cards! Lookie lookie, ~name~!
I want to see a cool disappearing act! I'll teach you one just so you can do it.
Tada! My hand made you lose! I deserve a round of applause.
Take off something worth watching. Unless you have stage fright, then take your time.
Show us how stripping can be cooler than magic, because it will never be!
It's ~name~'s turn! Come on, don't be shy. That's the worst way to act in this game.
You just can't handle my magic. But hey, this is all part of my act, otherwise I'd be naked now.
I'm watching very carefully, ~name~. Do something that would really make my mouth gape.
I'm like your cute assistant helping you get undressed in front of others. I should get a teensy praise for this.
I knew what cards you had, ~name~. I knew from the start that you would lose.
I already knew everyone's hand. If I would've lost, I would've said so after my swap.
A good magic trick starts with telling people your amazing end result. Let's try it, ~name~. Just say "I will appear completely naked."
Magic rules, regular card playing drools.
I had full trust in these cards. I'm proud of them!
Want to know how I got such a good hand? Too bad, it's a secret patented by me, and shared only to me!
Only the super awesome people win this round.
Won with nothing up my hidey spots.
You have been bested by not just magic, but by me!
You can learn some card stuff with me, and maybe you would win more often.
Your expression is telling me "I was trying my very best, but Sempai is just too smart for me!"
I knew you would lose, ~name~! Your jittery hand movements exposed everything.
In your face! I can win, with or without magic!
Accept your defeat like it's your job!
Oh, it's ~name~'s t-time to strip. D-don't steal my act!
W-were you distracted by me? S-sorry, this is all p-part of my finale.
You can't out m-match a finale, ~name~.
You didn't lose by my magic, so this loss isn't anything special.
I don't have anything else prepared, so go crazy with what you want to do, ~name~.
Don't let this show go out like a birthday candle.
There's no way you can out-do my performance, unless you're willing to make a bet.
I have a proposal. You can give up a banknote to me instead of stripping. I'm bored, and I want to show off a trick that involves spontaneous repair.
AH! Wh-wh-where did that come from?!
That's certainly a cool trick, but unless you seriously have more underwear, this is a really dumb idea!
Maybe I should've worn more underwear like you. It would give me a chance to show off. From colorful, to frilly, to sexy.
I'm waiting to be impressed. I'm just watching, watching, watching.
I can clearly see your attempt, but every angle is a terrible display.
You're doing things the easy way, but for me, this is too hard to watch.
But, I waited so patiently to see something amazing!
If that's your way of building tension, I better be screaming at the edge of my seat in the end.
I was so worked up over my win for nothing! That expends too much energy, you know.
Boo! What a lousy act.
I don't see how your ~clothing~ could have a follow up act. Not even for prop comedy.
If you're going to be this way, then I'll need to steal the show when it's my turn.
I'm sorry to say this, but that's lame.
Did you take off something? Sorry, you lost my attention.
What a below amateur presentation.
Clip joints are common at strip clubs, where the victim is tricked into receiving poor services. Your little trick failed, ~name~, because we didn't pay you.
That p-pales in comparison to me.
I wouldn't even use ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ in m-my magic act.
You could easily remove ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ while tied up. Or m-maybe not. I c-could try it for you.
I hear no m-magic. I hear some rope pulling here though.
I'm out of glitzy things to show off, so you really can show off anything you like with your ~clothing~.
My finale really was the best act here.
Are you sure you want to risk losing your ~clothing~ here?
Now that I'm actually paying attention, ~clothing.ifplural(those are|that is a)~ really cool ~clothing~.
There's a place that sells edible ~clothing~. They aren't tasty, but I love giving people a scare.
...nevermind.
Your underwear would fall in like two of the three categories.
A fancy trick means they are a fancy pair of underwear.
I don't know where you got your sun-rabbit-dove thing, but that was an amazing appearance!
Whoever is the special guest that broke the rules, you have made a terrific appearance!
Oh, there wasn't supposed to be a trick. Why was I darting my eyes at you again?
Nothing new even got revealed. I could go dove watching for more fun?
~Name~, don't you know that people will actually cheer if you do something spectacular?
No cool disappearing trick, or misshaping it? It sometimes takes sacrificing to entertain people.
This is just a boring street performance. Actually, it's even more boring than watching a human statue.
If you want to attract an audience, always start with your best acts that you're confident with. ~Name~ did not demonstrate a good act.
I could do something way better with your ~clothing~. There is a chance for me to break ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ though, but still worth it for the "oohs and aahs".
It's the thought of beating you at this game with magic that counts anyway.
I don't expect you to be an expert like me, but you've made no attempt at any interesting maneuvers.
My assistant is far from my magic skills, but he is far more talented than you.
It's better than nothing. Only nothing can be more boring than something.
A card game without fun stripping really loses its meaning of fun.
Of course, only I know the secret to spectacular performances anytime, anywhere.
You should learn to muscle pass your ~clothing~. Be the inventor of the anti-gravity ~clothing~.
Call your ~clothing~ something like "sparkly universal macaroni", and people will come to see it.
I have all the time in the world to watch you, ~name~.
I'll take some fashion tips from you, ~name~. Take off whatever, and let me know how attractive it would make me.
Watching you was p-pointless! Nothing fun!
I t-told you guys, ~name~ wasn't doing any magic.
I barely paid attention. I am s-still escaping!
Ignoring you, I can get out of these r-ropes.
AAAH! Stop it from killing us all!
AAAH! Kill it! Exorcise that thing!
The hat really is the signature of a magician. I admire your commitment of keeping it on until your bare body became bare, ~name~.
Is that box for sawing in half? Are you removing your legs?!
